analysis

Class WordsMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • analysis.WordsMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAnalysisResult, IMultilingual, IReadable, IReadableXML, ISaveableXML

    public class WordsMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAnalysisResult, IMultilingual
    This class is responsible for composing and filling a Document-Term matrix
    Author:
    Pdz
